fortune-i.name: Fortune I Book
fortune-i.desc: Enchantment. Increases your emerald yield by upto 2. Applied automatically.

fortune-ii.name: Fortune II Book
fortune-ii.desc: Enchantment. Increases your emerald yield by upto 3. Applied automatically.

fortune-iii.name: Fortune III Book
fortune-iii.desc: Enchantment. Increases your emerald yield by upto 4. Applied automatically.

looting-i.name: Looting I Book
looting-i.desc: Enchantment. Increases mob loot by 1.25x. Applied automatically.

looting-ii.name: looting II Book
looting-ii.desc: Enchantment. Increases mob loot by 1.75x. Applied automatically.

sharpness-i.name: Sharpness I Book
sharpness-i.desc: Enchantment. Increases damage against mobs by 1.25x. Applied automatically.Mi

sharpness-ii.name: Sharpness II Book
sharpness-ii.desc: Enchantment. Increases damage against mobs by 1.5x. Applied automatically.Mi

haste-i.name: Haste I Potion
haste-i.desc: Potion buff. Decreases mining cooldown by 0.5s.

haste-ii.name: Haste II Potion
haste-ii.desc: Potion buff. Decreases mining cooldown by 1s.

mooderald.name: Mooderald
mooderald.desc: Introduced as a meme currecncy as tribute to one of the support server admins, now its the currency for the auction house. Untradeable.

amulet.name: Bane Of Pillagers Amulet
amulet.desc: The rarest item in the game, it gives you a variety of buffs including +1 emerald yield and decreased chance of being pillaged. Untradeable.
